channel.title: Paying if you get my client working
channel.description:
So its a z474 base working fine then ive tried the client it came with and it never worked and other could't get it to work so i looked round for another client and i found the slashscape client which im using now i removed anti leach so i could see the error and it comes up with 6errors.
[code]SlashScape #474 Client Emulation - Revision 1.0 java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://72.8.134.108/474/cache.zip at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct orAccessorImpl.java:39) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC onstructorAccessorImpl.java:27) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:513) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j ava:1491) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(HttpU RLConnection.java:1485) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon nection.java:1139) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109) at Update.<init>(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:3499) at client.startUp(client.java:7096) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4578) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://72.8.134.108/474/cache.zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon nection.java:1434) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(HttpURLCon nection.java:2308) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldInt(URLConnection.java:579) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(URLConnection.java:474) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104) ... 6 more error[/code]
So if you guys can get me running i will pay you 2m i know its not much but its all i got atm.
Okay i did a tutorial on another site so anyway now it says this. I must need to add the cache but i don't know where to get it from and it on the tut i was missing a file called .ss474 and the cache file.
[code]SlashScape #474 Client Emulation - Revision 1.0 java.lang.NullPointerException at java.io.File.<init>(File.java:222) at Update.<init>(Update.java:25) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:3499) at client.startUp(client.java:7096) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4578) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)[/code]
What is says now
Add me on Skype Rs_tas Im the first one uk.
Thanks tas

item.title: Paying if you get my client working
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Help on these forums are free.

http://72.8.134.108/474/cache.zip doesn’t exist, therefore it could not download the cache and was unable to start up.

Read full topic
item.source: Paying if you get my client working

item.title: Paying if you get my client working
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“devenb123, post:2, topic:415961”]i have a great idea USE ANOTHER CLIENT

:o[/quote]
Your not very helpful…

But back on topic, @tasumaru, you should always use the client that comes with your server, it will work best then(Unless You really know what your doing), and show us the errors of the client that came with your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Paying if you get my client working

item.title: Paying if you get my client working
item.dc:creator: @tasumaru tasumaru
item.description:
@tasumaru wrote:

So its a z474 base working fine then ive tried the client it came with and it never worked and other could’t get it to work so i looked round for another client and i found the slashscape client which im using now i removed anti leach so i could see the error and it comes up with 6errors.

[code]SlashScape #474 Client Emulation - Revision 1.0
java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://72.8.134.108/474/cache.zip
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)

    at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct

orAccessorImpl.java:39)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC
onstructorAccessorImpl.java:27)
at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:513)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(HttpURLConnection.j
ava:1491)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(HttpU
RLConnection.java:1485)
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon
nection.java:1139)
at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109)
at Update.(Update.java:27)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:3499)
at client.startUp(client.java:7096)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4578)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)
Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://72.8.134.108/474/cache.zip

nection.java:1434)

nection.java:2308)

at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104)
… 6 more
error[/code]

So if you guys can get me running i will pay you 2m i know its not much but its all i got atm.

Okay i did a tutorial on another site so anyway now it says this. I must need to add the cache but i don’t know where to get it from and it on the tut i was missing a file called .ss474 and the cache file.

SlashScape #474 Client Emulation - Revision 1.0 java.lang.NullPointerException at java.io.File.<init>(File.java:222) at Update.<init>(Update.java:25) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:3499) at client.startUp(client.java:7096) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4578) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)

What is says now
